title: Deciphering miRNA signatures in axial spondyloarthritis: The link between miRNA-1-3p and pro-inflammatory cytokines
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Aneta Prokopcova, Jiri Baloun, Kristyna Bubova, Monika Gregova, Sarka Forejtova, Jana Horinkova, Marketa Husakova, Katerina Mintalova, Vladimir Cervenak, Michal Tomcik, Jiri Vencovsky, Karel Pavelka, Ladislav Senolt
